entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (clone_droid.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_10: I recommend relaxing with one of the many Entertainers in the galaxy.  If that doesn't suit your fancy, you'll just have to wait it out, I'm afraid.
entries.s_14: My scans indicate that you are in perfect health.  How do you feel?
entries.s_16: You don't have the funds in your bank to cover the transaction.  I recommend relaxing with one of the many Entertainers in the Galaxy.  If that doesn't suit your fancy, you'll just have to wait it out, I'm afraid.
entries.s_4: You look well enough to me.  Off you go.
entries.s_6: Unfortunately the cloning process can make you quite ill and incompetent in battle for a while.  For %DI credits I can give you an injection to cure the illness immediately.  Do you wish to pay %DI credits for the treatment?
entries.s_8: That's a little steep.  Are there any other options?
